subject: Marathon Running
organizations: Rock n Roll Philadelphia Half Marathon
lead_paragraph: Deena Kastor, 41, set a Masters world record in the half-marathon, finishing the Rock ’n’ Roll Philadelphia Half Marathon in 1 hour 9 minutes 36 seconds.
snippet: Deena Kastor, 41, set a Masters world record in the half-marathon, finishing the Rock ’n’ Roll Philadelphia Half Marathon in 1 hour 9 minutes 36 seconds.
